attributes.action: Stop scalpers bots buying next Gen consoles.
attributes.additional_details: Because customers been on a mission for a long time to get a new gaming console and it's always been having a shortage of stocks. It should be general demand and fair for everybody else.
attributes.background: Get the next gen consoles in general demand for everybody else

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Prevent/deter the buying and reselling of goods/services at inflated prices.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561986
